cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR. 

This paper discusses the evaluation of machine translation, specifically for pronoun translation. This topic falls under the sub-category of natural language processing (NLP), which is covered by cs.CL. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of automated metrics, which is a common topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions the use of test suites, which is relevant to information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper discusses the limitations of the automated metrics, which could be addressed using neural networks (cs.NE).
